summary: Documentary on Charles Bukowski, author of 'Notes of a Dirty Old Man', 'Love Is a Dog from Hell', and the autobiographical novels, 'Women', 'Hollywood', and 'Post Office'.
cast: Charles Bukowski|Bono|John Bryan|Linda Lee Bukowski|Marina Bukowski|Neeli Cherkovski|Joyce Fante|FrancEyE|Taylor Hackford|John Martin|Michael D. Meloan|Jack Micheline|Pam 'Cupcakes' Miller|Dom Muto|William Packard|Sean Penn|Steve Richmond|Barbet Schroeder|Harry Dean Stanton|Tom Waits|Carl Weissner|Liza Williams
title: Bukowski: Born into This
